items.title: Make up to 250 cuts with Greenworks’ 40V 18-inch high power cordless chainsaw kit at a new $255 low
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the Greenworks 40V High Power 18-inch Cordless Chainsaw Kit with a 5.0Ah HP battery and 5A rapid charger at $255 shipped, which beats out the direct website pricing, where it is still being offered for its full $300 MSRP. This is a newer electric cutting solution from Greenworks that has been on the market since June, though we’ve seen very few discounts on it in the months since then. We’ve only spotted it going as low as $288, with the $45 markdown here taking things further than ever to a new all-time low price.

items.title: Solve commuting needs while saving on storage space with MOD’s City 3 folding e-bikes at $1,799 lows
items.summary:
As part of MOD Bikes’ ongoing New Year Sale, which is continuing to offer rare price cuts of up to $400 across its e-bike lineup, you have a little more time left to hop on the City 3 Folding e-bike at $1,799 shipped, or its City+ Step-Thru 3 Folding e-bike at $1,799 shipped. These two variations of the brand’s folding commuter have spent much of the last year keeping to their $1,999 MSRPs, with discounts having only ever taken as much as $200 off at a time, whereas alternate models (mostly the SideCar e-bikes) have seen much larger discounts. There’s no telling when we’ll see another sale after this one ends, as the brand has been lessening them, so for the time that’s left, you can save $200 and get either at the best price we have tracked. You can also browse the full MOD New Year Sale lineup here.
